alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 9:55PM CDT until May 18 at 8:20AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Current River near Powder Mill affecting Shannon County. Jacks Fork at Alley Spring affecting Shannon County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Current River near Powder Mill. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 4.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 10.0 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.7 feet on 05/28/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
